title: XnSketch v1.12 – Turn your photos into cartoon or sketch
content: With XnView Sketch you can easily turn your photos into cartoon or sketch images. Features: – 18 different effects (black strokes, white strokes, pastel,  colored sketch, …) – Edge strength, and opacity adjustement – Contrast, brightness, saturation adjustement – Save or share the result  WHAT’S NEW Version 1.12: Facebook sharing Minor bugs fixed REQUIREMENTS OS […]

title: MacFonts-TechFonts 1.1 – MacFonts Tech Collection
content: A premier collection of 10 futuristic and digital style fonts, including a personal AND commercial use license for a single user so you can use the fonts in any home, business or for-profit project. All fonts are available in OpenType format and work in all applications including Quark, Illustrator, Photoshop, Microsoft Office, iLife, iWork, Pixelmator […]

title: Handy Clock v1.4 – Mac’s desktop clock that is both beautiful and practical
content: Handy Clock presents 6 beautiful designs to choose from depending on your taste and preference. title: Face4Pass v1.2 – Create photos for your documents
content: Face4Pass is an application that allows you to easily create photos for your documents (i.e passport). Drag and drop or open an existing file.On loading, the image quality is automatically improved. Take a photo with the built-in iSight camera.Edit many parameters of the image (exposure, contrast, saturation, temperature, tint, sharpness).For optimum sizing of the photo, […]

title: Apimac Notepad v9.9.5 – Store text by categories
content: Apimac Notepad helps you organize any piece of text you may want to be at hand.  Mac Notepad is designed from the ground up to support the latest Apple technologies and provides everything you need to be more productive in your work with your Mac. title: Screentaker v1.2.3 – Snap iOS screenshots
content: Screentaker is a small utility that makes creating nice screenshots for iOS apps easier by letting you apply effects to them. Simply drop the screenshot on Screentaker or even capture a screenshot from the iOS Simulator and choose the desired device, orientation and effect. The app is smart enough to detect the device and orientation automatically. […]

title: Push To Talk 1.2 – Keep your voice chats worry-free
content: Push to Talk is a slick and unobtrusive menu bar app that makes voice chats worry-free and keeps the flow of conversation clear. Simply press down the user-configurable hotkey when you want to activate your microphone, and then release when you want the microphone to be muted again.   The aim of this app is […]

title: Pin Pro for Pinterest 1.2 – Browse Pinterest from your menu bar
content: Pin Pro takes your Pinterest addiction to a whole new level. It is the best app for instantly browsing and uploading to your Pinterest account without ever having to open your web browser! Browse through the latest pinned images from your friends and the wider Pinterest community.
